sources.title: Puss 'n' Boos (1954)
sources.description: Casper the Friendly Ghost saves three kittens and they accept the unpopular little ghost as their friend. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/puss-n-boos-1954/

metadata.Plot: Casper the Friendly Ghost saves three kittens and they accept the unpopular little ghost as their friend. They and Casper have a lot of fun and the level-headed little specter stays busy keeping them out of mischief. Casper finds a good home for the orphaned-kittens but, despite the comforts of their new home, the kittens escape and return to their ghost-friend.
metadata.Writer: Larz Bourne, Isadore Klein, Seymour Kneitel
metadata.Actors: Mae Questel, Sid Raymond, Alan Shay
